original_text: So this is what the Lord says to Jacob's descendants. He is the one who rescued Abraham. He says, ‘Jacob's descendants will no longer be ashamed. Their faces will show their shame no more. So this is what the Lord says to Jacob's descendants. He is the one who rescued Abraham. He says, ‘Jacob's descendants will no longer be ashamed. Their faces will show their shame no more.
korean_text: 그러므로 아브라함을 구속하신 여호와께서 야곱 족속에 대하여 이같이 말씀하시되 야곱이 이제는 부끄러워하지 아니하겠고 그의 얼굴이 이제는 창백해지지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: So this is what the Lord says
He is the one who rescued Abraham
Jacob's descendants will no longer be ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱의 자손들은 더 이상 수치를 당하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Their faces will show their shame no more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 얼굴이 더 이상 수치를 드러내지 않을 것이다
